results.content: This course is a good introduction to PHP and MYSQL. The instructor goes through examples that the student can follow along with and test. I only came across two minor issues. First, there were instances where code for an example would change from one lecture to the next and the instructor did not go over the changes. Also, there are no samples of the pages the instructor created available for the student to go over. However, I feel the content of the course does make up for these issues.

results.content: I knew very little about PHP prior to taking this course, so I was a little nervous; however, Victor explained everything perfectly. I really enjoyed the MySQL / PHP connection lectures. Those videos were my favorite part of the whole course.
results.content_html: I knew very little about PHP prior to taking this course, so I was a little nervous; however, Victor explained everything perfectly. I really enjoyed the MySQL / PHP connection lectures. Those videos were my favorite part of the whole course.

results.content: While this has been a helpful exposure to PHP 7 and MySQL, none of the required files were available for the lectures, which made some parts of the course difficult. Also, there were several steps in the overall project where the instructor was working with code blocks that were clearly developed in a lecture that isn't included with this course ('password.php' for example). Nonetheless I believe I will be able to use what I learned in this course to access SQL tables to store user input, which is what I was hoping to learn.
results.content_html: While this has been a helpful exposure to PHP 7 and MySQL, none of the required files were available for the lectures, which made some parts of the course difficult. results.content: Very Good course making the basic and advanced understanding of PHP and MYSQL in very easier and lucid way
